entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop, multiple_queries, updates #59293
  • How to Fix ASP0006 within a loop? #59292
  • ASP.NET Core Identity and Auth documentation improvements #59290
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Blazor WASM with PWA and MapStaticAssets produce a wrong staticwebassets.endpoint.json file #59289
  • perf: default registered DataProtection works slower on linux compared to windows #59287
  • Cannot use Client Certificate Authentication in .http files #59285
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, updates #59280
  • `dotnet user-jwts` generates incorrect configuration #59277
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] `dotnet watch` may not inject `aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js` after `dotnet run` #59276
    10.0-preview1

Closed

  • Error: Failed to invoke 'JoinGroup' due to an error on the server #57845
  • [SignalR] Connection fails to consume ping messages leading to disconnect #58623
  • Produce binlogs by default in CI & internal builds #57030
  • What does this mean and how can it be resolved properly? Package 'Microsoft.AspNet.Mvc 5.2.8' was restored using '...' instead of the project target framework 'net8.0'. This package may not be fully compatible with your project. #59220
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #59240
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, updates #59279

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Skip MVC template tests on HelixQueueArmDebian12 #59295
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Use `NullLogger` instead of `NullLoggerFactory.CreateLogger` #59281
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Produce binlogs in internal builds #59296
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Set DefaultAppHostRuntimeIdentifier when building the product (i.e. i… #59286
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    area-infrastructure
  • [Infrastructure] Update Selenium versions #59268
    area-infrastructure
  • perf: improve allocations in `OwinEnvironment` #58917
    Perf, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
